Text:

wow as I write this, Alan Watts has been downloaded 822 times!!    I'm so glad I could share this with the world.   I hope you all become enlightened and perfectly aware.
ShortDog216: This was highly appreciated! Thanks for uploading. And thanks too all seeders. I will join forces to keep this torrent alive.
Yes this is great! I will seed whenever i remember to..

Thanks for keeping this alive guys, Alan Watts is the man!

Thank you so much friend for uploading this. :)
Thanx mate, I'm pretty sure I dowloaded this here ages ago.  I listened t it and definitely want to hear more.  VERY enlightening the whole worls should hear it.

Wow.. haven't logged in here since I ripped and uploaded this 2.5 years ago!!   So surprised to see it is still alive!  

Nice to see the thank-you's.. You're welcome everyone. 

I give special thanks to the Cleveland Public Library who provided the CD's to me.

Thank you for sharing, and a HUGE thanks for those who are seeding. 
The picture's kind of pretentious, to me, Alan Watts isn't a guru or a mystic, but a kind of "down-to-earth" man, only a very intellingent, common-sense and witty man.
Thank you people for holding this torrent still alive.
Not just "well organized" - but PERFECTLY organized!  Cleanest 64kbps rip I've heard in a very long time.   Thanks for this fantastic rip ShortDog216

ShortDog216!!! IOU 1

i too will join you all in keeping this alive and seeding indefinitely. along with other lecturers like terence mckenna and robert anton wilson
I almost never leave comments, but thank you for sharing this with us.
